article_title: Finra Levies $1 Million Fines on Barclay's, Goldman, BofA
article_text:
The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority said Wednesday that it has censured and fined the securities units of Barclays PLC, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Bank of America Corp. $1 million each for failing to provide complete information about so-called "blue sheet" data to regulators.

Blue sheets provide regulators with detailed information about trades performed by a firm and its customers, including the transaction size and other details. They are used to identify trading anomalies and investigate potential...
